duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maintain Linux systems, including CentOS, Ubuntu, and RedHat.
Administer storage systems, such as SAN, NAS, and RAID, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Utilize expertise in IBM technologies, including AIX and PowerVM, to support system infrastructure.
Provide on-call support and serve as the Subject Matter Expert for Linux and Storage Administration issues.
Independently troubleshoot technical issues and demonstrate resourcefulness in managing priorities and work projects.
